article_title: WATCH LIVE: Trump rallies in Connecticut days before primary
article_text:
Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump Donald TrumpTeam Sanders pressures Trump for debate AP: Trump clinches GOP nomination Secretary Clinton, voters need something good to feel about MORE is speaking to supporters in Waterbury, Conn., on Saturday morning.

Trump has a big lead in polls with the state’s GOP primary just three days away.

ADVERTISEMENT

Watch the event live in the video above.
